alert.note: Alert for Northwest Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 15 at 6:01AM AKST until January 17 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT AKST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Arctic Coast. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to midnight AKST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
